title: Carlos Tevez back at Boca Juniors for a third time
description: Carlos Tevez has returned to Boca Juniors for a third stint with his boyhood team.
content: The former Manchester United and Manchester City forward is back with the club after an unsuccessful spell with Shanghai Shenhua.Despite earning a reported £650,000 per week, the Argentine branded Chinese football as being 50 years behind Europe and South America.The 33-year-old, who previously played for Boca between 2001-04 and 2015-16, was welcomed by a message on the club's official Twitter account, which read: "Tevez came home! Today he joined Guillermo in Cardales and has already trained with his teammates."Tevez made 63 appearances for Manchester United between 2007 and 2009 before moving across Manchester, where he played 113 times for City scoring 58 goals.

Today he joined Guillermo in Cardales and has already trained with his teammates."Tevez made 63 appearances for Manchester United between 2007 and 2009 before moving across Manchester, where he played 113 times for City scoring 58 goals.
